document_data.name: Book of Thorns
document_data.author: Unknown
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Book of Thorns''''' was a [[druid]]ic [[spellbook]] of unknown origin found in the Realms.
document_data.Description: This tome consisted of four sheets of parchments, bound with [[thornroot]] vines between two boards of plain [[oak]].
document_data.Powers:
The ''Book of Thorns'' contained the following spells:
:''[[Call lightning]]'' • ''[[greenwood]]'' • ''[[control vapor]]'' • ''[[Phezult's sleep of ages]]'' • ''[[wall of thorns]]''
document_data.History:
The creator of this tome was unknown, though it was speculated it may have been the [[Hierophant]] druid [[Khamlautas Iriphar]] from [[Cormyr]].

It was gifted to the reclusive druid [[Aubaerus]] of the [[Dalelands]] by a druid circle known as the [[Battledale Seven]], who had dissolved sometime before the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]] who in turn had received it from the druid circle called the [[Ring of Wyvernwater]].
